attributes.action: public want a vote of no confidence in the government and want a election
attributes.additional_details: The Labour Party proposals to force the most vulnerable people into poverty even more by removing disability benefits and even refusing them for certain age groups this will even force people on carers allowance off the payment which as we know unpaid carers save the tax payer approximately £184 billion pounds per year just so they can save £5 billion so forcing unpaid carers off carers allowance will actually increase the cost to the government
attributes.background: To call a general election as the British public have no confidence in the current government and prime minister

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Call a General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700143

Stop PIP Cuts: Protect Support for Disabled People
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721918

Protect Disabled people who cannot work from planned cuts to benefits
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721547
